title: Recipe for Disaster
description: Have you ever had to work with someone who has a very different personality than you? When Sofia and Mollie are paired together to create a delicious cheesecake in Recipe for Disaster, they discover a lot about themselves and each other. Readers will relate to the problems these characters have to work through and will stay engaged with the compelling storyline. This book can be used to help readers analyze character as well as learn how to connect to prior knowledge and recognize and use adverbs.
